name: INV02 - Bảng kê phiếu xuất kho bán hàng
query:
SELECT 
    tdni.warehouse AS 'Mã kho',
    tw.warehouse_name AS 'Tên kho',
    'Xuất bán hàng' AS 'Loại xuất kho',
    tdn.posting_date as 'Ngày',
    tsle.name AS 'Số CT xuất kho',
    tso.name AS 'Số đơn hàng/hóa đơn',
    tdn.status AS 'Trạng thái',
    tdni.description AS 'Diễn giải',
    tdni.item_code AS 'Mã sản phảm',
    tdni.item_name AS 'Tên sản phẩm',
    tdni.stock_uom AS 'ĐVT',
    tdni.price_list_rate AS 'Giá',
    tdni.qty AS 'SL',
    tdni.price_list_rate * tdni.qty AS 'Thành tiền'
FROM `tabDelivery Note Item` tdni 
LEFT JOIN `tabDelivery Note` tdn ON tdn.name = tdni.parent 
LEFT JOIN `tabWarehouse` tw ON tw.name = tdni.warehouse 
LEFT JOIN `tabStock Ledger Entry` tsle ON tsle.warehouse  = tdni.warehouse 
LEFT JOIN `tabSales Order` tso ON tso.name = tdni.against_sales_order
LEFT JOIN `tabCustomer` tc ON tc.name = tdn.customer
LEFT JOIN `tabItem Group` tig ON tig.name = tdni.item_group
WHERE tdn.company = %(company)s
    AND tdni.warehouse = %(warehouse)s
    AND tdn.customer = %(customer)s
    AND tdn.posting_date BETWEEN DATE(%(start_date)s) AND DATE(%(end_date)s)
    AND tdni.item_group = %(item_group)s
report_name: INV02 - Bảng kê phiếu xuất kho bán hàng
